Someone once asked me the question about what NHK Saito was carving in the 
drama.
In the early episodes, what he made was not clear but recently the thing  
finally showed up  and you can see the photo here, if you don'tmind the spoiler.

http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/inside/f_inside2.html

S
P
O
I
L
E
R

Article said what Saito makes is a kind  of Kokeshi (wooden folkloricdoll)  
and he had made already several examples and gave one to Yagiboy and one to 
Sano for his marriage present. Currently he is making still another one but we 
don't know for whom he'll give it to the next time.

Tama
